elements.description:
Material design: [Dropdown menus](https://www.google.com/design/spec/components/buttons.html#buttons-dropdown-buttons)

`paper-dropdown-menu` is similar to a native browser select element.
`paper-dropdown-menu` works with selectable content. The currently selected
item is displayed in the control. If no item is selected, the `label` is
displayed instead.

Example:

    <paper-dropdown-menu label="Your favourite pastry">
      <paper-listbox slot="dropdown-content">
        <paper-item>Croissant</paper-item>
        <paper-item>Donut</paper-item>
        <paper-item>Financier</paper-item>
        <paper-item>Madeleine</paper-item>
      </paper-listbox>
    </paper-dropdown-menu>

This example renders a dropdown menu with 4 options.

The child element with the slot `dropdown-content` is used as the dropdown
menu. This can be a [`paper-listbox`](paper-listbox), or any other or
element that acts like an [`iron-selector`](iron-selector).

Specifically, the menu child must fire an
[`iron-select`](iron-selector#event-iron-select) event when one of its
children is selected, and an [`iron-deselect`](iron-selector#event-iron-deselect)
event when a child is deselected. The selected or deselected item must
be passed as the event's `detail.item` property.

Applications can listen for the `iron-select` and `iron-deselect` events
to react when options are selected and deselected.

### Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are also available for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--paper-dropdown-menu` | A mixin that is applied to the element host | `{}`
`--paper-dropdown-menu-disabled` | A mixin that is applied to the element host when disabled | `{}`
`--paper-dropdown-menu-ripple` | A mixin that is applied to the internal ripple | `{}`
`--paper-dropdown-menu-button` | A mixin that is applied to the internal menu button | `{}`
`--paper-dropdown-menu-input` | A mixin that is applied to the internal paper input | `{}`
`--paper-dropdown-menu-icon` | A mixin that is applied to the internal icon | `{}`

You can also use any of the `paper-input-container` and `paper-menu-button`
style mixins and custom properties to style the internal input and menu button
respectively.

properties.name: selectedItemLabel
properties.description:
The derived "label" of the currently selected item. This value
is the `label` property on the selected item if set, or else the
trimmed text content of the selected item.

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description:
The last selected item. An item is selected if the dropdown menu has
a child with slot `dropdown-content`, and that child triggers an
`iron-select` event with the selected `item` in the `detail`.

properties.name: value
properties.description:
The value for this element that will be used when submitting in
a form. It is read only, and will always have the same value
as `selectedItemLabel`.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label for the dropdown.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder for the dropdown.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: The error message to display when invalid.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the dropdown is open. Otherwise, false.

properties.name: allowOutsideScroll
properties.description:
By default, the dropdown will constrain scrolling on the page
to itself when opened.
Set to true in order to prevent scroll from being constrained
to the dropdown when it opens.

properties.name: noLabelFloat
properties.description:
Set to true to disable the floating label. Bind this to the
`<paper-input-container>`'s `noLabelFloat` property.

properties.name: alwaysFloatLabel
properties.description:
Set to true to always float the label. Bind this to the
`<paper-input-container>`'s `alwaysFloatLabel` property.

properties.name: noAnimations
properties.description:
Set to true to disable animations when opening and closing the
dropdown.

properties.name: horizontalAlign
properties.description:
The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
horizontally relative to the dropdown trigger.

properties.name: verticalAlign
properties.description:
The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
vertically relative to the dropdown trigger.

properties.name: dynamicAlign
properties.description:
If true, the `horizontalAlign` and `verticalAlign` properties will
be considered preferences instead of strict requirements when
positioning the dropdown and may be changed if doing so reduces
the area of the dropdown falling outside of `fitInto`.

properties.name: restoreFocusOnClose
properties.description: Whether focus should be restored to the dropdown when the menu closes.

properties.name: contentElement
properties.description: The content element that is contained by the dropdown menu, if any.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Show the dropdown content.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Hide the dropdown content.

methods.name: _onIronSelect
methods.description: A handler that is called when `iron-select` is fired.

methods.name: _onIronDeselect
methods.description: A handler that is called when `iron-deselect` is fired.

methods.name: _onTap
methods.description: A handler that is called when the dropdown is tapped.

methods.name: _selectedItemChanged
methods.description: Compute the label for the dropdown given a selected item.

params.name: selectedItem
params.description:
A selected Element item, with an
optional `label` property.

methods.name: _computeMenuVerticalOffset
methods.description:
Compute the vertical offset of the menu based on the value of
`noLabelFloat`.

params.name: noLabelFloat
params.description:
True if the label should not float
above the input, otherwise false.

methods.name: _getValidity
methods.description:
Returns false if the element is required and does not have a selection,
and true otherwise.

return.desc:
true if `required` is false, or if `required` is true
and the element has a valid selection.

attributes.name: selected-item-label
attributes.description:
The derived "label" of the currently selected item. This value
is the `label` property on the selected item if set, or else the
trimmed text content of the selected item.

attributes.name: selected-item
attributes.description:
The last selected item. An item is selected if the dropdown menu has
a child with slot `dropdown-content`, and that child triggers an
`iron-select` event with the selected `item` in the `detail`.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:

a form. It is read only, and will always have the same value
as `selectedItemLabel`.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the dropdown.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The placeholder for the dropdown.

attributes.name: error-message
attributes.description: The error message to display when invalid.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True if the dropdown is open. Otherwise, false.

attributes.name: allow-outside-scroll
attributes.description:
By default, the dropdown will constrain scrolling on the page
to itself when opened.
Set to true in order to prevent scroll from being constrained
to the dropdown when it opens.

attributes.name: no-label-float
attributes.description:
Set to true to disable the floating label. Bind this to the
`<paper-input-container>`'s `noLabelFloat` property.

attributes.name: always-float-label
attributes.description:
Set to true to always float the label. Bind this to the
`<paper-input-container>`'s `alwaysFloatLabel` property.

attributes.name: no-animations
attributes.description:
Set to true to disable animations when opening and closing the
dropdown.

attributes.name: horizontal-align
attributes.description:
The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
horizontally relative to the dropdown trigger.

attributes.name: vertical-align
attributes.description:
The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
vertically relative to the dropdown trigger.

attributes.name: dynamic-align
attributes.description:
If true, the `horizontalAlign` and `verticalAlign` properties will
be considered preferences instead of strict requirements when
positioning the dropdown and may be changed if doing so reduces

attributes.name: restore-focus-on-close
attributes.description: Whether focus should be restored to the dropdown when the menu closes.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: set to true if combobox is disabled

properties.name: items
properties.description: Contains all the items; filled either by remote request or if no remote is given by parameter

properties.name: searchable
properties.description: Defines if the combobox is searchable

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label of the combobox

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Contains the row index of the selected value

properties.name: _selectedItem
properties.description: Contains the current selected item

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description: Contains the current selected item without style attribute

properties.name: value
properties.description: Contains the content of the value field of the selected item

properties.name: displayField
properties.description: Determines which field is used to display a row

properties.name: displayFieldDescription
properties.description: Determines greyed out Description of a row

properties.name: valueField
properties.description: Determines which fields is used to fill the value field

properties.name: labelField
properties.description:
Determines which fields is used to show the value displayed after selection;
if null the value in displayField will be used

properties.name: render
properties.description: Could contain a render function that determines how the row looks like

properties.name: searchValue
properties.description: Contains the current search pattern

properties.name: remote
properties.description: Contains the url from where the data is obtained

properties.name: remoteSearch
properties.description: Determines if the search is done locally or remotely if a remote is set

properties.name: params
properties.description: Params that are sent when remote data is loaded

properties.name: remotePathData
properties.description: Determines which field of the response is contains the items

properties.name: totalItemsField
properties.description: Determines which field of the response is determines the total count items

properties.name: autoLoad
properties.description: Determines if the box is automatically loading from remote

properties.name: itemsPerPage
properties.description: Numbers of items per page

properties.name: startField
properties.description: Determine which field we use in the request to define the start of the paging

properties.name: limitField
properties.description: Determines which field is used in the request to send the limit

properties.name: totalItems
properties.description: Information how many items would exist in total

properties.name: page
properties.description: current page we are on

properties.name: _loading
properties.description: True if combobox is currently loading

properties.name: _loadingCount
properties.description: Amount of active transactions

properties.name: allowDeselect
properties.description: Determines if deselect is allowed

properties.name: noLabelFloat
properties.description: Set to true to disable the floating label.

properties.name: alwaysFloatLabel
properties.description: Set to true to always float the label.

properties.name: noAnimations
properties.description:
Set to true to disable animations when opening and closing the
dropdown.

properties.name: verticalAlign
properties.description: Wraps vertical align value of paper-dropdown-menu

properties.name: horizontalAlign
properties.description:
The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
horizontally relative to the dropdown trigger.

methods.name: _getSelectedItem
methods.description: Remove style of selectedItem

methods.name: _onPaperItemTap
methods.description: Handles deselect if the selected item is tapped again

methods.name: _onLoadingCountChanged
methods.description: Determines if there is currently an active call

methods.name: firstPage
methods.description: loads the first page

methods.name: lastPage
methods.description: loads the last page

methods.name: nextPage
methods.description: loads the next page

methods.name: previousPage
methods.description: loads the previous page

methods.name: onPageChanged
methods.description: Triggers reload on page change

methods.name: _serialize
methods.description:
takes the given object and creates an http query string from it
usage: let str = _serialize({foo: 'bar', baz: ['a', 'b']}); => 'foo=bar&baz[0]=a&baz[1]=b'

params.name: prefix
params.description: internal only (used in recursive calls for nested objects)

methods.name: _onItemsPerPageChanged
methods.description: Determines wether paging is on or off

methods.name: _onRemoteChanged
methods.description: Called when remote is changed

methods.name: _onParamsChanged
methods.description: reload when params have been changed

methods.name: load
methods.description:
Trigger load data
Debounces because of quasi simultaneously changed values of itemsPerPaged and param for example or multiple page changes

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Loads the data from remote

methods.name: onItemsChange
methods.description:
Observer of items
We will apply the search to the new data if we have no remote search
and select the correct item if the old item is still there
if we have remote search we will insert the selected item at the beginning if it is not seen after search

methods.name: _getDisplayValue
methods.description: Returns the value to be displayed for the item

methods.name: _getDisplayValueDescription
methods.description: Returns the value to be displayed for the item

methods.name: _getValue
methods.description: Returns the value for the item

methods.name: _getItemLabel
methods.description: Returns the label of combobox

methods.name: valueChanged
methods.description: selected values has been changed; if this happens by data binding we select the correct record

methods.name: selectedChanged
methods.description:
selected row has been changed
we set the correct value and _selectedItem (that we need to restore item if remote filter removed selected item)

methods.name: _doSearch
methods.description: Here we perform our search

methods.name: _loadAfterSearch
methods.description: Reload after search

methods.name: _stopEventPropagation
methods.description:
Stops event propgation of selected events to avoid closing the dropdown-menu or selecting items
when we dont want to do that

methods.name: _canPageBackward
methods.description: checks if the user can page backwards

methods.name: _canPageForward
methods.description: checks if the user can page forwards

params.name: itemsPerPage
params.description: how many items per page should be shown

params.name: totalItems
params.description: how mnay items are in the grid in total

methods.name: _getItemsFrom
methods.description: calculates the offset for the pagination query

params.name: page
params.description: the page to calculate the offset for

params.name: itemsPerPage
params.description: how many items per page should be shown

methods.name: _getItemsTo
methods.description: returns the index of the last item on the given page

params.name: page
params.description: the pag to calculate the last index for

params.name: itemsPerPage
params.description: how many items per page should be shown
